meanings.sent2: He walked guiltlessly past the scene of the crime, his alibi confirmed.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched guiltlessly in the sun, enjoying the warmth on its fur.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed guiltlessly towards the sea, following its natural course.
